# Job Posting

<center> Job Title: Online Reservation Solution for Parks Canada Agency (Phase 3) </center>

## Tender Details

| **Category** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | WS3591211515-Doc3815675536 |
| **Amendment Number** | 6 |
| **Solicitation Number** | [WS3591211515](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-22-01011866) |
| **Publication Date** | January 5, 2023 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | January 31, 2023, at 2:00 P.M. (Eastern Time) |
| **Location** | Canada |

## Business Requirements

The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada is seeking an online reservation solution to support the Parks Canada Agency. The selected service provider will be responsible for delivering an enterprise-wide, commercially available reservation solution with a fully managed service including system configuration, implementation, maintenance, upgrades, and operation. This is Phase 3 of a multi-phase procurement process.

## Eligibility and Bid Details

Only qualified suppliers are invited to bid. The Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) #5P047-22-0072 (Solicitation number: WS3591211515) was published on CanadaBuys. Interested suppliers must submit their bids electronically.

## Evaluation Criteria

The bid evaluation will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Agreements and Restrictions

This procurement is open to service providers who are eligible to do business with the Government of Canada and who have the necessary skills and expertise to deliver an online reservation solution. The selected service provider must agree to the terms and conditions of the contract.

## Deadline for Bid Receipt

January 31, 2023, at 2:00 P.M. (Eastern Time)

## Contact Information for Clarification

Huajun Li (Li.Huajun@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

The office of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) reserves the right to reject any or all bids and to select the supplier who best meets the requirements of this project. Only qualified suppliers are invited to bid. For more information, please refer to the Solicitation document and CanadaBuys. service provider will be responsible for delivering an enterprise-wide, commercially available reservation solution with a fully managed service including system configuration, implementation
